treatment-md.title: Gopherus morafkai Murphy, Berry, Edwards, Leviton, Lathrop & Riedle, 2011, sp. n.
treatment-md.article-title: The dazed and confused identity of Agassiz's land tortoise, Gopherus agassizii (Testudines, Testudinidae) with the description of a new species, and its consequences for conservation
